document.full_text: roger federer stunned novak djokovic and rafa nadal beat andy murray as the four musketeers put on swashbuckling displays on friday, with a classic duel still to come in sunday's french open final.
document.title: nadal and federer excel to seal dream final
lines_and_colors: roger federer stunned novak djokovic and rafa nadal beat andy murray as the four musketeers put on swashbuckling displays on friday, with a classic duel still to come in sunday's french open final.
